Deprecated API

Contents
  • Deprecated Methods
Deprecated Methods
hudson.model.Hudson.addListener(JobListener)
          Use getJobListners().add(l) instead. 
hudson.model.Descriptor.configure(HttpServletRequest)
          As of 1.64. Use Descriptor.configure(StaplerRequest). 
hudson.model.Hudson.contains(TopLevelItem)
          why are you calling a method that always return true? 
hudson.model.Job.getBuild(String)
          This is only used to support backward compatibility with old URLs. 
hudson.model.Hudson.getJob(String)
          Left only for the compatibility of URLs. Should not be invoked for any other purpose. 
hudson.scm.SubversionSCM.getModules()
          as of 1.91. Use SubversionSCM.getLocations() instead. 
hudson.model.Hudson.getNodeName()
            
hudson.model.Hudson.getUrl()
          Why are you calling a method that always returns ""? Perhaps you meant Hudson.getRootUrl(). 
hudson.model.Computer.isTemporarilyOffline()
          You should almost always want Computer.isOffline(). This method is marked as deprecated to warn people when they accidentally call this method. 
hudson.model.TopLevelItemDescriptor.newInstance(StaplerRequest)
          This is not a valid operation for Jobs. 
hudson.model.Hudson.removeListener(JobListener)
          Use getJobListners().remove(l) instead. 
hudson.FilePath.toString()
